Room.Name: Oceancrest Circle
Room.ShortDescription: You are on the eastern rim of the great Oceancrest Circle.
Room.LongDescription: These magnificent circles scattered throughout Oceancrest display the proud heritage of the city. The Oceancrest Circle welcomes all visitors to Oceancrest. Visitors to Oceancrest are warned that some of the less desirable elements of any city are likely to be found in the northeastern quadrant of the town, and are therefore advised to avoid the area.
